verses.verse: And the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me came again<WH7725>, and waked<WH5782> me<WH376>, as a man that is wakened<WH5782> out of his sleep<WH8142>.

And he said<WH559> unto me<WH7200>, What seest thou<WH559>? And I said, I have seen<WH7200>, and<WH4501>, behold, a candlestick all of gold<WH2091>, with its bowl<WH1531> upon the top<WH7218> of it<WH7651>, and its seven lamps<WH5216> thereon<WH7651>; there are seven pipes<WH4166> to each of the<WH7651> lamps<WH5216>, which are upon the top thereof<WH7218>;
and two<WH8147> olive-trees<WH2132> by it<WH259>, one upon the right<WH3225> side of the bowl<WH1543>, and the other<WH259> upon the left side thereof<WH8040>.
And I answered<WH6030> and spake<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me<WH559>, saying, What are these<WH113>, my lord?
Then the angel<WH4397> that talked<WH1696> with me answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> unto me<WH3045>, Knowest thou not what these are<WH559>? And I said, No<WH113>, my lord.

Then he answered<WH6030> and spake<WH559> unto me<WH559>, saying, This is the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> unto Zerubbabel<WH2216>, saying<WH559>, Not by might<WH2428>, nor by power<WH3581>, but by my Spirit<WH7307>, saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>.

Who art thou<WH1419>, O great mountain<WH2022>? before<WH6440> Zerubbabel<WH2216> thou shalt become a plain<WH4334>; and he shall bring forth<WH3318> the top stone<WH68> with shoutings<WH8663> of Grace<WH2580>, grace<WH2580>, unto it.
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

The hands<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> have laid the foundation<WH3245> of this house<WH1004>; his hands<WH3027> shall also finish<WH1214> it<WH3045>; and thou shalt know that Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath sent me unto you<WH7971>.

For who hath despised<WH936> the day<WH3117> of small things<WH6996>? for these seven shall rejoice<WH8055>, and shall see<WH7200> the plummet<WH68> in the hand<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216>; these<WH7651> are the eyes<WH5869> of Jehovah<WH3068>, which run to and fro<WH7751> through the whole earth<WH776>.
Then answered<WH6030> I<WH559>, and said unto him<WH8147>, What are these two olive-trees<WH2132> upon the right<WH3225> side of the candlestick<WH4501> and upon the left side thereof<WH8040>?

And I answered<WH6030> the second<WH8145> time<WH559>, and said unto him<WH8147>, What are these two olive<WH2132> - branches<WH7641>, which are beside<WH3027> the two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> spouts<WH6804>, that empty<WH7324> the golden oil out of themselves<WH2091>?
And he answered<WH559> me and said<WH559>, Knowest<WH3045> thou not what these are<WH559>? And I said, No<WH113>, my lord.
Then said<WH559> he<WH8147>, These are the two anointed<WH3323> ones<WH1121>, that stand<WH5975> by the Lord<WH113> of the whole earth<WH776>.
